release_note: Thank you for using Everlog. In this release: Improved conflict resolution when editing an entry on multiple devices at the same time Fixed a problem that caused locations to duplicate Several bug fixes and improvements

Thank you for using Everlog. In this release: Workouts with routes will now show the route on the map. Added setting to use Journaling Suggestion s title and date for entries. Fix for a possible crash at launch Better handling of numbered lists and headers in Markdown Updated alternate icons Several bug fixes and improvements

Thank you for using Everlog. In this release: Added new options to the floating button to add entries from the Photo Library or the camera. Added floating button settings to customize the button s functionality and appearance. Workouts with routes will now show the route on the map. Added setting to use Journaling Suggestion s title and date for entries. Fix for a possible crash at launch

Thank you for using Everlog. In this release: Added Journaling Suggestions. Now you can get ideas for your daily journaling. Available in iOS 17.2 and above. Added the ability to attach videos to your journal entries. Added new options to the floating button to add entries from the Photo Library or the camera. Added floating button settings to customize the button s functionality and appearance. Workouts with routes will now show the route on the map. Fix a memory problem related to backups and exporting

Thank you for using Everlog. In this release: Added Journaling Suggestions. Now you can get ideas for your daily journaling. Available in iOS 17.2 and above. Added the ability to attach videos to your journal entries. Added new options to the floating button to add entries from the Photo Library or the camera. Added floating button settings to customize the button s functionality and appearance. Workouts with routes will now show the route on the map.

Thank you for using Everlog. In this release: Added Journaling Suggestions. Now you can get ideas for your daily journaling. Available in iOS 17.2 and above. Added the ability to attach videos to your journal entries. Fixed a possible error while backing up or exporting.
Thank you for using Everlog. In this release: Bug fixes related to video attachments

Thank you for using Everlog. In this release: Added support for Journaling Suggestions. Now you can get ideas for your daily journaling. Available in iOS 17.2 and above. Added the ability to attach videos to your journal entries.
Thank you for using Everlog. In this release: Small improvements to the interface Bug fixes
Thank you for using Everlog. In this release: Added ability to export all entries to a single text file

Thank you for using Everlog. In this release: Two new home screen widgets have been added The possibility to import from Stoic was added The line height of lists has been fixed adjusted A bug related to the long press gesture with the Apple Pencil was fixed Log mindful minutes on iPad Adjustments for the new iOS version

Thank you for using Everlog. In this release: Two new home screen widgets have been added The possibility to import from Stoic was added The line height of lists has been fixed adjusted A bug related to the long press gesture with the Apple Pencil was fixed

Thank you for using Everlog. In this release: Fixed syntax highlighting for URLs with hyphens in the url scheme Added search field to the location screen Fixed a possible crash when importing from Day One Fixed incorrect pressure information in weather detail screen

Thank you for using Everlog. In this release: Added a setting to use the selected calendar date for new entries Now using tint colors for dashes bullets and checkboxes Fixed bug in Find Entries Shortcuts action

Thank you for using Everlog. In this release: New image viewer with support for markup and text recognition New menu item to copy entries from Timeline contextual menu New smart date placeholders in templates using date:yyyy MM dd syntax and any combination of Unicode date format patterns. These will be automatically replaced when inserting the template. Fix a rare crash related to the menu
Thank you for using Everlog. In this release: Fixed a crash that could sometimes happen at launch
Thank you for using Everlog. In this release: Fixed a crash when moving an entry from the Timeline

Thank you for using Everlog. In this release: You can now filter your entries by location from the menu sidebar You can now directly create an entry with a template from the New Entry button with long press Templates now have a journal parameter. This is the journal that will be used by default when creating an entry with a template. You can now have comments in different journals Improved the assignment of locations Fixed bug that would cause syncing to stop
Thank you for using Everlog. In this release: Added template parameter to the Write Entry shortcut Added new iCloud Sync screen with more detailed info
Thank you for using Everlog. In this release: Log time spent writing as mindful minutes in the health app Bug fixes related to templates

Thank you for using Everlog. In this release: Templates. Journaling just got easier! You ll never have to start from scratch again. Try it now and elevate your journaling game! Daily Reminders. Get a daily reminder to ensure you stay on track with your journaling. Bugfixes.

Thank you for using Everlog. In this release: Templates. Journaling just got easier! You ll never have to start from scratch again. Try it now and elevate your journaling game! Daily Reminders. Get a daily reminder to ensure you stay on track with your journaling.
Thank you for using Everlog. In this release: Fixed a bug in widget and intents extensions
Thank you for using Everlog. In this release: Fixed a bug related to automatically adding location to journal entries
Thank you for using Everlog. In this release: iCloud Sync optimization
Thank you for using Everlog. In this release: Fixed dozens of small bugs
Thank you for using Everlog. In this release: Fixed a bug related to tags with spaces

Thank you for using Everlog. In this release: Trash Deleted entries will now be put in the trash and will then be permanently deleted after 30 days. This can be changed in Settings General. Shortcuts More shortcuts and better shortcuts. Run them using Siri or from Spotlight. No setup required. Drag and Drop Entries can now be dragged into journals in the sidebar to move them and onto the calendar to change their date. Custom Interface Color You can now change the interface color from Settings Appearance Interface Color. Journal Icons You can now set custom icons for your journals.
Thank you for using Everlog. In this release: Bug fixes Add photos using drag and drop

Thank you for using Everlog. In this release: Location. Add location information to entries. You may choose to add it automatically from the settings. Weather. Add weather data to entries. You may choose to add it automatically from the settings. Lock Screen Widgets. Check your journaling stats from the lock screen. Focus Filters. Filter journals depending on Focus Modes. On This Day Notifications. Get notifications when there are entries to review in On This Day.

Thank you for using Everlog. In this release: Added a new option to show Markdown syntax as you type on by default You can now add checkboxes separators and quotes to journal entries Optimized editor speed You can now open entries in a new window on iPad and macOS
Thank you for using Everlog. In this release: Added the ability to hide journals from On This Day Fixed a problem in Shortcuts
Thank you for using Everlog. In this release: Improvements in the editor experience Bug fixes
Thank you for using Everlog. In this release: Bug fixes in Markdown rendering

Thank you for using Everlog. In this release: On This Day. Remember the entries you wrote on this day in past years. New Widgets. New small medium and large widgets that show On This Day entries and photos. More Privacy Options. You can now choose to ask for the passcode only after a set period of time.
Thank you for using Everlog. In this release: Added Wind Down Shortcuts to remind you to write to your journal before going to bed
Thank you for using Everlog. In this release: Syncing optimization and bug fixes
Thank you for using Everlog. In this release: Syncing optimization and bug fixes

Thank you for using Everlog. In this release: Automatic Backups. Automatically back up your journals on a regular basis. Requires Premium Batch Operations. Select multiple entries to perform batch operations. Extra Quick Actions to add entries to different journals from the home screen. New font: New York.

Thank you for using Everlog. In this release: Added the ability to import journals from the Journey app Added the ability to export to txt Fix bug causing Premium to sometimes be deactivated by mistake
Thank you for using Everlog. In this release: Added the ability to import journals from the Diarly app Multiple performance enhancements
Fixed minor bug related to import feature
Added advanced settings to the import function
Fixed a bug that would delete newly created entries with photos but no text

Thank you for using Everlog. In this release: Added 20 fonts to choose from Added the ability to swipe between entries from the editor Improved the Premium Status screen to provide ways to manage your subscription Added setting to hide word count
Fixed a visual problem with Markdown links
Thank you for using Everlog. In this release: Added an iCloud Sync status icon to the entry editor Various bug fixes
Fix Markdown highlight shortcut
Thank you for using Everlog. In this release: Markdown support. Format your entries with powerful Markdown syntax. Add formatting from the keyboard accessory Setting to start entries with a title
Fixed navigation bar on iPad

Thank you for using Everlog. In this release: Journals and Tags will now be indexed in Spotlight The search terms are now highlighted in the search results Added ability to hide photos from the Timeline Both images and text are now shared when sharing entries
Fixed a possible crash when adding photos from the camera
Thank you for using Everlog. In this release: Added the ability to add text and photos from other apps using the share sheet. Added custom color selector for journals Premium
Thank you for using Everlog. In this release: Added the ability to attach multiple photos at once Several stability improvements
Fixed a possible crash in iOS 13

Thank you for using Everlog. In this release: Tags: Add tags to your entries using hashtag notation and find all your tagged entries from the sidebar. Links: Link to any entry journal or tag. Long press on a journal tag or entry and select Copy Link . Tag Journal Conversions: Convert journals to tags or vice versa. Requires Premium Collapse and expand the journals and tags sections in the sidebar Show or hide comments as well as the time in the Timeline
Everlog is now available in Japanese You can now tap on website URLs phone numbers dates and addresses in your journal entries
Fixed a possible crash while importing large files from Day One
Fixed a problem with scrolling in the editor Fixed a possible crash while importing large files from Day One Other small improvements
Fixed a crash related to importing
Added timeline and editor font size settings Added onboarding screens when launching the app for the first time
